Package org.cleverbus.core.common.asynch.confirm

Confirmation functionality.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ConfirmationPool Pools confirmations (=external calls) in the ExternalCallStateEnum.FAILED state.
ConfirmationService Service contract for manipulation with confirmations.
 

Class Summary
ConfirmationPollExecutor Reads confirmations (=external calls) from DB and sends them for next processing.
ConfirmationPoolDbImpl Polls confirmations in the ExternalCallStateEnum.FAILED state.
ConfirmationServiceImpl Implementation of ConfirmationService interface.
ConfirmationsPoolRoute Route definition that starts job process that pools failed confirmations for next processing.
DefaultConfirmationCallback Default implementation of ConfirmationCallback that only logs information and nothing more.
DelegateConfirmationCallback Implementation of ConfirmationCallback that delegates confirmation to ExternalSystemConfirmation implementation.
JobStarterForConfirmationPooling Starts new job for pooling confirmations from the queue.
 

Package org.cleverbus.core.common.asynch.confirm Description

Confirmation functionality.

When message finish its processing (message is in the final state OK, FAILED or CANCEL) then it's necessary to inform source system about result of processing.
